import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FilterAction from "../Store/Action/FilterAction"; import SearchBarAction from '../Store/Action/SearchBarAction' const FilterPanel = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const res = useSelector(state => state.SearchBarReducer?.FilterData) const SidebarFilterData = useSelector(state => state.FilterReducer?.SidebarFilterdata) console.log(SidebarFilterData) const categoryId = res.data?.filterArray[0].category[0] const filterdata = res.data?.FilterData // console.log(reqpayload) useEffect(() => { let reqpayload = { "categoryId": categoryId, "FilterData": filterdata } FilterAction(dispatch, reqpayload) }, [categoryId, filterdata]) return <>
